snippet: The Obama administration carried out 438,421 deportations in 2013, a record number according to official figures published Wednesday, a figure that shows a continuing move away from removals of immigrants living in the interior of the country.
abstract: Homeland Security Dept reports Obama administration carried out record number of 438,421 deportations in 2013; analysis of figure shows continuing move away from removals of immigrants living in the interior of the country, toward focus on swift expulsion of those caught crossing border illegally.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration carried out 438,421 deportations in 2013, a record number according to official figures published Wednesday, a figure that shows a continuing move away from removals of immigrants living in the interior of the country.

headline.main: Deportation Up in 2013; Border Sites Were Focus
headline.print_headline: Deportation Up in 2013; Border Sites Were Focus
